reviews.review: My favorite game I wish I could write a full review but it would be better in video form
我的心脏已经跳到太平洋了

Teamplay focussed with no in-game chat. Requires lateral thinking to communicate and work together, along with consideration and courtesy to play well

Pro tip - dont unhook survivors with killer around unless you have the perk "Borrowed Time" (or similar) that protects the unhooked survivor, otherwise they quickly get thrown back on the hook

Honestly aside from the occasional toxic killer, the community here is always trying to help each other out. People will go out of their way to help you and now screw you over. You are on a hook and the end gate is open for the other 3 to leave? Chances are they will come back and juke the killer to get you out of there. I love playing it and its just a blast!
vale cada maldito centavo el juego y jugar con amigos mejor aun 10/10
Я конечно обосрался но мне понравилось игра топ

Ставлю этой игре 100 из 10 ;
-Зашел в игру 
-Выбрал перса 
-Захожу без перков против нюрсы с топ адонами 
- умирают все мои нервные клетки 
- +Alt +F4
- Удаляю игру
-Устанавливаю игру обратно 
- И так в течении дня 
В кратце игра стоит этих эмоций
Игра не меняется. Только новые выжившие и маньяки.

Its all fun and games until you're being stalked by a stealth killer. Then bam all of a sudden Michael is on Tier 3 and its all over. Games sucks ass but i love it.

best game ive ever played,at least in the horror department

The skill checks take some getting used to, so it's pretty frustrating at first. But once you get your bearings, this game can be super fun!  Look for strategic ways to hide, lose them off your trail, etc. It's a good game.

If you try out dbd you will not be disappointed.  This is a fun and exciting game that will also have you cussing and pulling your hair out from time to time.  The fun of destroying a team of 4 as a killer or saving a teammate at the end of the match and having everyone escape are both equally exciting.  That being said getting destroyed by the killer in 1 minute or having a supposed teammate drop a pallet in front of you during a chase can be absolutely maddening.  I feel like survivor is more of a challenge, do to the fact that you really need to depend on your team (unless you play like a horribly selfish teammate) and with the killer its all you. I would recommend this to anyone who enjoys competition or who just enjoys a good tense game.

Excelente juego.
El único problema es el rendimiento y las caidas de fps en pcs de media-baja calidad
This game is very fun and addicting. I highly recommend it. If you love halloween or creepy things in general this is the game for you. Super fun to play with a group of friends too!
非对称对抗游戏的代表，什么筹码，什么笔记都是模仿，这个游戏一开始玩是恐怖游戏，玩多了就变成休闲游戏，会玩和不会玩完全是两种体验。萌新入坑玩屠夫不要在国服玩，排不到人，挂加速器玩其他服，很舒服的，秒匹
